transcripts.text: So let us stand with our president.  Let us stand up for this truth, that President Trump is the greatest president since Abraham Lincoln.  God bless America.

I know him so well, and he's a special, special man with a very, very, very, very special family.  So, congratulations on receiving the National Humanitarian Medal.
